name: THE BUTTON
description: THIS GAME IS ONLY A BUTTON.(for now) the point of this "game" right now is to show what I learn as I use unity. During the process, I plan on adding story, leaderboard (I Hope) and much more, as of now the game isn't much (which is why It's free), but as time goes on, the game will get better and better and will have more and more.
